remarks: Deduce strict ordering from its properties.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
isso2i.1 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x R y <-> -. ( x = y \/ y R x ) ) ) $.
isso2i.2 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A /\ z e. A ) -> ( ( x R y /\ y R z ) -> x R z ) ) $.
isso2i $p |- R Or A $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
